name: campgrounds
description: - Clone the repository(git clone ...), or download the zip in your local machine. - Install dependencies(npm install) - Install MongoDB, add the bin folder - from the installation directory - to path (to set mongod and mongo shell as environment variable). - Change the port to listen to in App.js to 8080.(app.listen(8080, function(){...}); ) - Start the server from the yelpcamp folder with - npm run start
author: rold
